note.p: Daughter of the reverend Edmund Dana, vicar of Wroxeter, and his wife the Honourable Helen Kinnaird, third daughter of the 6th Lord Kinnaird. Married John Gibbons in St Chad’s, Shrewsbury in 1800. Had three children, including William Henry Kinnaird Gibbons.
Shropshire, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1901 (Ancestry.com, accessed 3 October 2022)
